title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: sets v(t) = x2'(t)

1 point is earned for: answer

v(t) = x2'(t)

v(t) = 2t - 1 ⇒ t = 1.57054

The two particles are moving with the same velocity at time t = 1.571 (or 1570)
